H0.text: Which author?s son was killed in World War I, events depicted in the TV film called My Boy Jack. Rudyard's contemporary, H.G. Wells

H1.text: Which author?s son was killed in World War I, events depicted in the TV film called My Boy Jack. Wilfred Owen's friend, Siegfried Sassoon

H2.text: Which author?s son was killed in World War I, events depicted in the TV film called My Boy Jack. The famous playwright, George Bernard Shaw

H3.text: Which author?s son was killed in World War I, events depicted in the TV film called My Boy Jack. Kipling

A6.text: The only son of English author Rudyard Kipling.
